class.name: EditorExport
class.brief_description: Hosts data related to a project's export configuration.
class.description: Editor-only singleton that hosts a project's [EditorExportPlatform], [EditorExportPreset], and [EditorExportPlugin] objects. Use this class to retrieve information about a project's export configuration.

method.name: get_export_platform
method.description: Returns the [EditorExportPlatform] at index [param idx]. [param idx] must be equal to or greater than [code]0[/code] and less than the result of [method get_export_platform_count].

method.name: get_export_platform_count
method.description: Returns the number of unique platforms available for export. This includes platforms that do not have an export preset in the current project.

method.name: get_export_preset
method.description: Returns the [EditorExportPreset] at index [param idx]. [param idx] must be equal to or greater than [code]0[/code] and less than the result of [method get_export_preset_count].

method.name: get_export_preset_count
method.description: Returns the number of export presets in the project.

signal.name: export_presets_runnable_updated
signal.description: Emitted when the [code]runnable[/code] property of an [EditorExportPreset] has been updated or when an [EditorExportPreset] has been added to or removed from the project.

signal.name: export_presets_updated
signal.description: Emitted when the properties of an [EditorExportPreset] have been updated.
